responsibilities: Designing and developing cloud based (AWS, BOSH and Cloud Foundry) environment to run microservices oriented systems.
Devloping backend systems with Spring Boot.
Working on Android client for financial system for worldwide loan company

items.name: Android

Android development with Java and Kotlin. Knowledge of both Eclipse and IntelliJ Idea (Android Studio) IDEs. Familiarity with popular (RxJava, Dagger2, Retrofit2, Butterknife) and less popular (Koin, Calligraphy) libraries. Gradle and Maven knowledge.
iOS
items.description: iOS development with Objective-C. Knowledge of both Xcode and AppCode IDEs. Familiarity with popular libraries.

items.name: Cloud development
items.description: Familiar with Cloud Foundry PaaS (Pivotal Cloud Foundry Developer 1.7 Certificate). Spring Boot web application development.

items.name: Other

items.note:
I'm a mobile software developer for a few years now. I've started with Windows Phone/WinRT, but later turned to iOS and Android. I've been working on many different projects, from social startups to medical and financial systems for international companies and teams that came in all shapes and sizes (from being single mobile dev in a project to being part of a huge teams distributed in multiple countries around the world). Currently I'm into Android development and I would like to follow this path in the future.

Lately, I found great interest in learning Kotlin (both for Android and Spring purposes) and I've tried to tackle with full blown test driven development for Android.

You can find me on:
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/pawelraciborski
- GitHub: https://github.com/Majfrendmartin

Interests: IT news, music, sci-fi and fantasy books, history, photography, computer games.

Credits:

This is an open source project and the code can be found here: https://github.com/Majfrendmartin/resume
